Changelog
=========

0.9.1 (2018-11-30)
------------------

- Parse TOXENV in appveyor.yml.


0.9.0 (2018-11-19)
------------------

- Handle syntax errors while parsing setup.py.
- Handle 'Programming Language :: Python :: {N} :: Only" classifiers.
- New option: --skip-non-packages.


0.8.0 (2018-11-16)
------------------

- First public release.
